name: XHYK: R-Squared
description:
A top-down shooter where you battle as one of 10 randomly selected elements.

Left Click to Fire
Move with WASD

"U" Changes Resolution
"I" Toggles Fullscreen

If you are missing health and the blue bar reaches full, you will get healed 30% of your health.

Once something dies the positions are reset.

If you die you gain a loss.
If they die you gain a win.

Each Element has varying stats which are:

Attack
Defense
Attack Speed
Projectile Speed
Move Speed
Type
